E -

java.lang.Iterable<E>
public class CMLElements<E extends nu.xom.Element>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<E>

class to manage child elements in similar manner to XOM Elements. differs from XOM as this is iterable

Author:
pm286, and ramin
